dct_alternative_sm: Nova totius Americae sive novi orbis tabula
dct_description_sm: Hugo Allardt excudit. inde Kalver Straet inde Werrelt Kaert ; Velde schulp.
California shown as an island with indented northern coast, with points, capes and nearby islands labelled. Agubela de Cato as peninsula to northeast. The Great Lakes are not shown.
Title cartouche at top left. Vignette along map bottom of explorers talking with natives.
